Detailed Description

Create a list of recent post's. By default the standard Wordpress post's is the post type.

this can be changed with the setPostType() method.

Member Function Documentation

◆ init()

RecentPosts::init ( )

initialize the class.

◆ setContainerClasses()

RecentPosts::setContainerClasses (   $setContClasses)

Set classes for container element.

◆ setContainerType()

RecentPosts::setContainerType (   $setContType)

Define what kind of element that is going to be used as container element. That mean's the top element that surrounds the list items.

Default container element is ul.

◆ setElementClasses()

RecentPosts::setElementClasses (   $setElemClasses)

Set classes for list elements.

◆ setElementType()

RecentPosts::setElementType (   $setElemType)

Define what kind of element that is going to be used as list item

Default element is li.

◆ setItemsNumber()

RecentPosts::setItemsNumber (   $setItemsNum)

Define how many item's that is going to be displayed.

Default number is 10.

◆ setOrderAfter()

RecentPosts::setOrderAfter (   $setOrder)

What kind of post the list is going to be sorted after.

Avaliable sortings

  • date
  • author
  • title
  • modified
  • random
  • none

Default order is date.

◆ setPostType()

RecentPosts::setPostType (   $setPType)

Define which post type that is going to be listed.

The default post type is WP post.

If a custom post type is created, this can be listed with this class.

◆ setSortingDirection()

RecentPosts::setSortingDirection (   $setSortingDirection)

Define the direction of the list.

Avaliable options

  • DESC
  • ASC

◆ setTitle()

RecentPosts::setTitle (   $setListTitle)

Define a title for the list if this is needed.

Default the list does not house a title.

◆ setTitleClasses()

RecentPosts::setTitleClasses (   $setListTitleClasses)

Set the class/classes for the title.

◆ setTitleElementType()

RecentPosts::setTitleElementType (   $setTitleElemType)

Set the type of element that the title is going to have.

Default this element is span.
